ext_description.message: Safer send, vim-like scroll, model toggles, temporary chats, and clean UI for Gemini.
ext_description.description: Short description shown in the Chrome Web Store and extension list.

html_lang.description: Language code applied to the popup HTML tag.

popup_section_feature_toggles.description: Heading for the feature toggles section in the popup.

popup_section_shortcuts.description: Heading for the shortcuts section in the popup.

popup_loading.description: Shown while popup data is loading.

popup_load_error.message: Failed to load settings. Please reload the extension.
popup_load_error.description: Error shown when loading settings fails.

popup_settings_unavailable.description: Fallback message when no settings are available.

popup_toggle_label_vim_scroll.description: Label for the Vim-like Scroll toggle.

popup_toggle_label_wide_screen.description: Label for the Wide Screen toggle.

popup_toggle_label_safe_send.description: Label for the safe send toggle.

popup_toggle_label_other_shortcuts.description: Label for the miscellaneous shortcuts toggle.

popup_toggle_enable_success.description: Success toast after enabling a feature toggle. $1 is the feature name.

popup_toggle_disable_success.description: Success toast after disabling a feature toggle. $1 is the feature name.

popup_toggle_save_error.message: Failed to save the toggle. Please try again.
popup_toggle_save_error.description: Error toast when saving a toggle fails.

popup_resetting.description: Text shown on the reset button while processing.

popup_reset_success.message: All settings have been restored to defaults.

popup_reset_error.message: Failed to reset settings. Please try again.
popup_reset_error.description: Error toast when resetting settings fails.

popup_shortcut_placeholder.description: Placeholder text in the shortcut input.

popup_shortcut_conflict_user.message: "$1" is already assigned to "$2". Please choose a different key.
popup_shortcut_conflict_user.description: Error message when a shortcut conflicts with another user shortcut. $1 is the binding, $2 is the conflicting shortcut name.

popup_shortcut_conflict_gemini.message: "$1" conflicts with Gemini's default "$2" shortcut. The default may not work as expected.
popup_shortcut_conflict_gemini.description: Warning message when a shortcut conflicts with a Gemini default shortcut. $1 is the binding, $2 is the Gemini shortcut label.

error_shortcut_requires_modifier.message: "$1" must be combined with a modifier key.
error_shortcut_requires_modifier.description: Shown when a disallowed single key is used without modifiers.

error_shortcut_forbidden_key.message: "$1" cannot be used as a shortcut.
error_shortcut_forbidden_key.description: Shown when a key is not allowed at all.

popup_shortcut_error_disallowed_key.message: "$1" cannot be used as a shortcut key.
popup_shortcut_error_disallowed_key.description: Error message when a key or combination is disallowed.

popup_shortcut_error_modifier_required.description: Error message when a key must be combined with modifiers.

popup_shortcut_success.description: Success toast after saving a shortcut. $1 is the shortcut name.

popup_shortcut_error.message: Failed to save the shortcut. Please try again.
popup_shortcut_error.description: Error toast when saving a shortcut fails.

popup_shortcut_empty_state.message: No shortcuts are enabled. Turn on a toggle to manage shortcuts.
popup_shortcut_empty_state.description: Info message shown when no shortcuts are available.

keyboard_label_ctrl.description: Label for the Control modifier key.

keyboard_label_cmd.description: Label for the Command modifier key.

keyboard_label_alt.description: Label for the Alt modifier key.

keyboard_label_shift.description: Label for the Shift modifier key.

shortcuts_section_gemini_defaults.description: Section title for Gemini default shortcuts.

shortcuts_section_vim_scroll.description: Section title for Vim scroll shortcuts.

shortcuts_section_wide_screen.description: Section title for wide screen shortcuts.

shortcuts_section_model_switching.description: Section title for model switching shortcuts.

shortcuts_item_open_settings.description: Label for the shortcut item that opens settings.

shortcuts_action_open_settings_link.description: Text for the action link that opens settings.

shortcuts_dialog_close.description: Aria label and tooltip for the dialog close button.

shortcut_label_scroll_top.description: Label for the Scroll to Top shortcut.

shortcut_label_scroll_bottom.description: Label for the Scroll to Bottom shortcut.

shortcut_label_scroll_up.description: Label for the Scroll Up shortcut.

shortcut_label_scroll_down.description: Label for the Scroll Down shortcut.

shortcut_label_scroll_half_up.description: Label for the Scroll Half Page Up shortcut.

shortcut_label_scroll_half_down.description: Label for the Scroll Half Page Down shortcut.

shortcut_label_toggle_focus.description: Label for the Toggle Focus shortcut.

shortcut_label_toggle_model.description: Label for the Toggle Model shortcut.

shortcut_label_mode_instant.description: Label for the Set Mode: Instant shortcut.

shortcut_label_mode_thinking.description: Label for the Set Mode: Thinking shortcut.

shortcut_label_temporary_chat.description: Label for the Open Temporary Chat shortcut.

shortcut_label_toggle_shortcuts.description: Label for the Toggle Shortcuts List shortcut.

shortcut_label_delete_chat.description: Label for the Delete Chat shortcut.

shortcut_label_upload_files.description: Label for the Upload Files shortcut.

shortcut_label_pin_chat.description: Label for the Pin Chat shortcut.

gemini_default_shortcut_new_chat.description: Gemini default shortcut label for starting a new chat.

gemini_default_shortcut_search.description: Gemini default shortcut label for search.

gemini_default_shortcut_toggle_sidebar.description: Gemini default shortcut label for toggling the sidebar.

toast_no_chat_selected.description: Toast shown when no chat is selected.

toast_pin_failed.description: Toast shown when pinning a chat fails.

toast_temp_chat_failed.message: Could not open a temporary chat. Please reload the page.
toast_temp_chat_failed.description: Toast shown when opening a temporary chat fails.

toast_delete_failed.description: Toast shown when deleting a chat fails.

toast_send_button_missing.description: Toast shown when the send button cannot be located.

toast_upload_failed.message: Could not open the upload menu.
toast_upload_failed.description: Toast shown when the upload menu cannot be opened.

toast_gem_create_failed.message: Could not open Gem creation. Please reload the page.
toast_gem_create_failed.description: Toast shown when the Gem creation page cannot be opened.

chat_delete_dialog_title.description: Title of the custom delete chat confirmation dialog.

chat_delete_dialog_body_generic.message: This will delete the currently selected chat.
chat_delete_dialog_body_generic.description: Generic body text for the delete chat dialog when the chat title is unknown.

chat_delete_dialog_body_named.message: This will delete the chat "$1", including prompts, responses, and feedback. Continue?
chat_delete_dialog_body_named.description: Body text for the delete chat dialog when the chat title is known. $1 is the chat title.

chat_delete_dialog_confirm.description: Confirm button text in the delete chat dialog.

chat_delete_dialog_cancel.description: Cancel button text in the delete chat dialog.
